bibl.et: Genetic basis and functioning of the signal transduction system in plants under the conditions of viral resistance.
bibl.aa: Zabolotny Institute of Microbiology and Virology, National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine, ul. Academician Zabolotny, Kyiv 03143, Ukraine.

record.ab: This paper analyzes the genetic basis and modern conception of molecular mechanisms of recognition of pathogens, mainly viruses, by plants. The importance of signal systems and their key factors in plant organisms are discussed. The possible role of different elicitors in signal transduction processes is reviewed.
